page.title: 14SHOPS IN BUILTH WELLS
page.content: There is a good variety of shops in the town,my favourite being the {hairdressers.}There is both an {indoor {and outdoor market,}the latter selling livestock on Mondays. The indoor market is quite small but sells many things.We have six {building {societies}spread around the town and several {banks},the newest being Barclays which was rebuilt about 3 years ago. There are many{pubs and {hotels},some with {restaurants}.The {fish and chip shop}is situated near Bank Square and there are{cafes and {a snack bar.}We have two{paper shops} which also sell cards and stationery. There are very many {food and non-food {shops,}two {jewellers}and a shop selling wall-paper and paint. Some of the specialist shops are{gunsmiths, {video,craft,florist and bakery.}The only{supermaket}is Fine Fare.
